thread.title: BRIEF-General Cable Corp Stockholders Approve Acquisition By Prysmian Group

title: BRIEF-General Cable Corp Stockholders Approve Acquisition By Prysmian Group

organizations.name: brief-general cable corp stockholders approve acquisition by prysmian group

text: February 16, 2018 / 5:11 PM / Updated 27 minutes ago BRIEF-General Cable Corp Stockholders Approve Acquisition By Prysmian Group Reuters Staff Feb 16 (Reuters) - General Cable Corp: * GENERAL CABLE CORPORATION STOCKHOLDERS APPROVE ACQUISITION BY PRYSMIAN GROUP * GENERAL CABLE CORP - ‍TRANSACTION IS EXPECTED TO CLOSE BY Q3 OF 2018​ * GENERAL CABLE CORP - APPROXIMATELY 99% OF TOTAL VOTES CAST WERE VOTED IN FAVOR OF MERGER​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
